content: try out this crochet gummy bear coaster pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/yej6lnlw8cm skill level intermediate format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -any colour -yarn needle -scissors -stuffing -stitch marker final size - 10 cm in diameter
